Ltd.|The Walt Disney Company India]] | slogan = '''Where the Magic Begins''' | country = [[India]] | language = [[Hindi language|Hindi]], [[English language|English]], [[Tamil language|Tamil]], [[Telugu language|Telugu]] | broadcast area = [[India]] | headquarters = [[Mumbai]] | available = Check Local Cable | former names = '''Playhouse Disney''' (2006-2011) | replaced names = [[Playhouse Disney India]] | sister names = [[Disney Channel India]]
[[Disney XD (India)]]
[[Hungama TV]] | web = [http://www.disney.in/disneyjunior/ www.disney.in/disneyjunior/] }} '''Disney Junior India''' is the block that replaced India's Playhouse Disney block. Disney Junior India serves as a block on Disney Channel India. The program debuted at 11:00 a.m. on Monday, July 4, 2011 on Disney Channel. The programming telecasts in English, Hindi, Tamil and Telugu. ==History== [[File:Playhouse Disney.svg|thumb|right|Logo of former Playhouse Disney]] Disney Junior was formerly called Playhouse Disney and was a preschool-programming block that launched in India in 2006. It roadcast on Disney channel. It was broadcast in Hindi and English, and ran on Disney Channel India from July 1st 2011. On July 4th, it got replaced with Disney Junior with a multi-language option (English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu). It serves as a 2-3 hr block on Disney Channel India. == Shows == * [[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]] * Toy Treats * [[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]] * [[Cars Toons]] * [[Handy Manny]] '''NEW!''' == Upcoming shows == * A Poem Is...... * [[Little Einsteins]] * [[Mickey Mousekersize]] * [[Special Agent Oso]] == Former Shows == * [[The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!]] ==External links== *[http://www.disney.in/disneyjunior/ Disney Junior India: Official Website] {{Disney Channel}} [[Category:Disney Channel]] [[Category:English-language television stations in India]]
